metadata.title: CVE-2017-16876 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the _keyify function in mistune.py in Mistune before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging failure to escape the "key" argument.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16876` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mistune - 0.8.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mistune package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.1-1').
